item.title: How we do accessibility at NAV
item.description: Providing everyone equal access to welfare services through NAV is not only legally mandated, but it is fundamental to NAV’s mission. A big part of that is making sure our web services are accessible and easy to use. With 80 cross-functional product teams, this work needs to scale well. In this talk I will explain how we work with accessibility at NAV through our design system and accessibility teams. We will talk about testing, training, sharing and culture building.
